title: Train fault reported on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #BukitGombak to #JurongEast is operating normally now.
[NSL] Expect additional 5mins travelling time from #BukitGombak to #JurongEast due to a train fault at #BukitGombak.
[NSL] A train fault has been reported at #BukitGombak Northbound. Train will be travelling slower towards #JurongEast.
